document.description: Where is the best fast food restaurant? Panera if you are looking for a healthier option. ... Round Table Pizza Coupons; Restopolitan.com Coupons; Shop The Shows Coupons

Home Answers.com > Wiki Answers > Categories > Food&Cooking > Restaurants and Dining Establishments > What is the best fast food restaurant? What is the best fast food restaurant? In: Restaurants and Dining Establishments [ Edit categories ]
Answer: Burger King, how can you not LOVE the whopper. Double whopper omg! Triple whopper Geez.
My personal favorite is Burger King but Fazoli's and Arby's are really good as well.
i think wendys to me is better and so is chic-fil-a

The BEST fast food or restaurant slogans? People with a taste for life...! What is the best colour for a fast food restaurant ? orange is the best color What fast food restaurant has the best fries? macdonalds What is in fast food restaurant food ? It is helpful to understand what the government allows in feed or to be used in conventional production: Dairy cows - antibiotics, pig&chicken byproducts, hormones (for growth), pesticides,... The most fast food restaurants ? i believe mcdonalds does
